title: トム・リー率いるビットマイン、170億円相当のETHを新規購入か＝Lookonchain報告
contentSnippet: トム・リー氏率いるビットマインが約173億円相当のイーサリアムを新規購入かと報告。保有額は2兆円超え、世界最大のETH保有企業として総供給量の2.8%を保有。株式の流動性も米国46位にランクイン。

title: XRP and SOL Futures Open Interest on CME Hits Record High
contentSnippet: Record XRP and Solana futures activity pushed open interest on the derivatives giant’s platform to roughly $3 billion, signaling renewed retail and institutional appetite for altcoin exposure.

title: XRP Trades Higher on Big Flows, Yet Technical Setup Signals Caution
contentSnippet: Traders should watch for XRP to maintain support around $2.60-$2.63, as a sustained rise above $2.65 could shift the bias bullish.

title: バイナンス、3銘柄を11月上場廃止予定
contentSnippet: 大手仮想通貨取引所バイナンスがフラミンゴ、カデナ、パーペチュアルプロトコルの現物取引ペアを11月12日に上場廃止すると発表した。定期審査の結果、業界基準を満たさないと判断された。

title: Microsoft Values $135 Billion Stake in OpenAI as Firms Face Legal Pressure
contentSnippet: The recapitalization gives OpenAI freedom to partner with competitors and release open-weight models, even as both firms face legal pressure.

title: 【2026年度】仮想通貨（暗号資産）の最新税制要望から読み解く今後の法改正シナリオ｜Aerial Partners寄稿
contentSnippet: JVCEAと金融庁が2025年に提出した仮想通貨税制の最新要望を解説。ETF導入、申告分離課税、株式等同等扱いの3つの改正シナリオと、今後の制度変更に向けて準備すべきことを整理する。

title: Bitcoin Dip Looks Standard Pre-FOMC and $120K Would Open Path to $143K, Analysts Say
contentSnippet: After a quick jump toward $116,094 faded, buyers showed up near $112,500 while analysts watched $120,000 as the level that could clear the way toward $143,000.

title: RWAトークン化企業セキュリタイズ、SPAC上場決定　評価額は約1900億円
contentSnippet: RWAトークン化大手のSecuritizeが、Cantor Equity Partners IIとのSPAC合併により株式上場を発表。企業価値12.5億ドル、ブラックロックなど既存投資家が全株保有。市場シェア20%を占める最大手プラットフォーム。

title: 米ビットコインETF、ブラックロック除外では年初来マイナスフローに
contentSnippet: K33のアナリストが、米国の仮想通貨ビットコイン現物ETFの年初来流入がIBITに集中していると指摘。ブラックロックの役割の大きさが示されている。

title: Bitwise's Solana ETF Draws $69.5M on Debut, Outpacing Rival Fund's Launch
contentSnippet: The strong early inflows suggest institutions are favoring Bitwise’s direct staking model as Solana ETFs start gaining traction.

title: リップルやSBI出資のエバーノース、すでに154億円相当のXRPを保有＝オンチェーンデータ
contentSnippet: エバーノースが約3.89億XRPを購入し、投資額は9.47億ドルに達したことが分かった。既に5000万ドル以上の含み益を得ている。

title: Recent Bitcoin Crash Has Put $1B in sUSDe Loop Trades at Risk, Research Firm Says
contentSnippet: looped positions that rely on borrowing stables to buy sUSDe are at risk, Sentora Research said.

title: 万博提供のデジタルウォレット、約100万ダウンロード達成
contentSnippet: 大阪・関西万博で提供された「EXPO2025デジタルウォレット」が約100万ダウンロードを達成。会期中に累計590万件の取引を処理した。10月31日より「HashPort Wallet」へリニューアルし、マルチチェーン対応やDEX機能を搭載する。

title: Oasys、イーサリアムとのブリッジ対応を発表
contentSnippet: ゲーム特化型ブロックチェーンOasysが、イーサリアムとのブリッジに対応。異なるチェーン間での資産移動が可能に。分散型取引所での交換も開始し、IPトークン化への展開を加速。

title: 『甲虫王者ムシキング』のブロックチェーンゲーム　11月上旬にリリース予定
contentSnippet: Kyuzanがセガの人気IP『甲虫王者ムシキング』のブロックチェーンゲームを開発。MUSHIトークンを活用した期間限定カードバトルとして10月下旬にリリース予定。約90種類のムシカードが登場。

title: トランプ一族関与のワールドリバティ、USD1ポイント参加者に1.8億円相当のWLFIトークンを配布
contentSnippet: トランプ一族関連のワールドリバティがUSD1ポイントプログラム参加者への報酬配布を発表した。提携取引所を通じて合計840万WLFIトークンが配られる予定だ。

title: Asia Morning Briefing: Bitcoin Holds Ground as Traders Sit on Stablecoins Before Fed Decision
contentSnippet: The market is confident that the Fed will cut rates. But crypto traders are still waiting for confirmation.

title: OpenAI Reveals Over 1 Million ChatGPT Users Discuss Suicide Weekly
contentSnippet: OpenAI says it’s strengthening suicide crisis safeguards, but a former researcher says the fixes don’t go far enough.

title: Humanoid Race Heats Up as 1X Unveils Talking Home Robot Helper NEO
contentSnippet: Analysts expect the humanoid and service-robot markets to exceed $300 billion within the next decade as companies continue to forge ahead.

title: Australia’s Financial Regulator Flags Broader Oversight of Crypto Under Updated Guidance
contentSnippet: The final guidance expands last year’s draft, adding new examples and custody rules as ASIC shifts from proposals to enforceable oversight.

title: Sam Altman Confronts Backlash Over GPT-5 Rollout, Unveils Expanding Vision During AMA
contentSnippet: The OpenAI CEO admitted the company mishandled the GPT-5 upgrade and said adults deserve freer tools.

title: AI Backlash Is Here: Even Sophisticated Users Are Getting Sick of Tech's Latest Obsession
contentSnippet: Forced AI software features are stirring real user frustration, while studies on fatigue are piling up. Is a full-blown revolt in our future?

title: Ethereum Set to Debut 'Key to Layer-2 Scaling' as Fusaka Upgrade Clears Final Test
contentSnippet: Ethereum's Fusaka upgrade, set for December 3, will introduce a long-anticipated system for making layer-2 transactions even cheaper and more efficient.

title: Bitcoin Miner TeraWulf's Stock Soars on Google-Backed AI Expansion Plans
contentSnippet: The publicly-traded miner said it was adding more AI computing power as part of its deal with Fluidstack. Other miners' share prices fell.

title: Mt. Gox Bitcoin Billions Are Being Repaid—How We Got Here
contentSnippet: More than a decade after the world’s largest Bitcoin exchange was hacked, Mt. Gox creditors are finally being repaid—with further delays.

title: SUI Slides 3.4% as $2.60 Support Snaps on 180% Volume Surge
contentSnippet: Volume spiked 180% over average as nearly 2.7M tokens traded in a single minute.

title: Tether Tokenized Gold Reserves Exceeded 11.6 Tons in Q3 Amid Yellow Metal's Rally
contentSnippet: Tether's gold-backed token swelled above $2 billion market cap, driven by record prices and surging retail demand, CEO Paolo Ardoino said in an interview.

title: Bitcoin Sinks Below $113K as Stocks Hit Records; Sell-Off Could Have Room to Run, Says Bitfinex
contentSnippet: Nvidia closed in on a $4 trillion market cap amid CEO Jensen Huang's keynote speech at a tech conference, seemingly sucking capital out of crypto on Tuesday afternoon.

title: Blockchain-Based Polymarket Eyes U.S. Comeback by November: BBG
contentSnippet: Polymarket previously announced it would launch a token and had acquired a CFTC-registered entity.

title: Ethereum’s Fusaka Upgrade Completes Final Hoodi Test Ahead of Mainnet Launch
contentSnippet: With all three tests done, developers will finalize the date that Fusaka will go live on mainnet, tentatively aiming for December 3.
